name: Astra's Moon
description:
Astra's ship has crashed. Help her get back to the moon!

Blast through enemies and climb high to make it back home.

Made for Lospec Jam 1

Controls
KeyboardKeyboard WASDXBOX (gamepad)Move:Arrowkeys
WASDDpadJump:Z, SpacebarJAShoot:X, AltKXPause:EnterEnterStart Button Credits

Game by theJAMARK1

Music by ComboMon using Plouge Chipsynth SCF
